mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tgroub_table (contentid, contenttype, mapx, mapy, count) VALUE (#{contentid}, #{contenttype}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{count}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE contentid = #{contentid}

insert into t_bookmark_table (TourMembercode, contentid) select (select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{TourMembercode}), contentid from dual where not exists (select * from t_bookmark_table where contentid = #{contentid})
